episode_event_ch0356_00_zeiyu/4001_1001_: Hmm...

So, Trainers and Pokémon from all over the
world gather here, huh.
Wait, what?! This island’s artificial?!
How rich IS this Lear guy?!

He looks super bossy! So annoying!
Blueberry Academy is just as good a facility,
y’know!
Oh, there she is!
See? Told you I heard her!
Carmine’s so loud...
Yeah, she really stands out, huh...
Huh?! What’s that supposed to mean?

Anyway, long time no see! I didn’t know you
guys were here too!

Yeah! I’m so glad we get to spend some
time together again!

Oh, by the way, where’s Juliana? Didn’t she
come with you guys?
Yup, she’s here on Pasio, too!
I knew it!

She’s got some nerve not even saying hi
to me!
Oh yeah, and there’s also—

OK, fine! Whatever! I’ll just go find her
myself!
Oh...there she goes...

Aww... We had other stuff we wanted to
tell her.

Oh well. We’ll probably see her again soon
anyway.
episode_event_ch0356_00_zeiyu/6801_1001_: On Pasio, I’M probably seen as an outsider.

But I’m used to battling away from home—
like in extracurricular stuff!

I’m gonna prove to everyone I’m cool and
strong enough to make it worldwide!
